FuncDef:
The description command configures a description for an SRv6 mapping policy.
The undo description command deletes the description of an SRv6 mapping policy.
By default, no description is configured for an SRv6 mapping policy.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the description of an SRv6 mapping policy.
The value is a string of 1 to 242 case-sensitive characters, spaces supported.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To facilitate memorization and management, run the description command to configure a description for an SRv6 mapping policy.
